content.p: Take a look at completed projects below. Food design is no longer just for chefs. Robots are transforming factory hygiene. . Co-bots working collaboratively with humans. Blending manufacturing technology with optimisation-based design changes Women in Tech Revolution Exploring innovative hybrid products to support powerful and engaging new gifting experiences Exploring transformative potential of data driven systems at the core of manufacturing processes Delivering a suite of tools to optimise manufacturing system performance Influencing the policy process
